title: Riot I think You Just F*cked Up
body: I don't think I've seen this much negative response from an announced event for League ever

replies.body:
Logged in just to agree with you guys.

Honestly one of the biggest disappointments in Rito history.

Lore event Retcon
Removal of Solo queue
Removal of Draft pick (relating to OCE)
Not giving us our server skin free (also OCE)

I mean in the last Year they have been taking a lot of bad press for really... odd decisions by their company.

The draven thing is mostly a problem because it actually interferes with gameplay (and you can't turn it off).

Hell i had to move around in a bush, simply because i wasn't sure i was in the bush because the head was in the way.
Lying about solo queue, adding Draven heads you can't remove which just make the game annoying to play, won't be playing until they're removed on the 4th.

Pretty much sums it all up:

http://i.imgur.com/4OBwiTt.jpg
Ikr,i used to like draven memes now i cant fucken stand them
they removed it anyway, they took it off.

Actually hating on Rito right now. I can assure you that over half of the community was hyped up for URF, don't know why they didn't release it... I'd rather have surf than the rotating game modes tbh.

They did say multiple times that URF wont be back at april fools this year. So you shouldnt be mad or surprised. And they will have it at least twice as part of rotating game mode. Dont know why they are so anal about the alternative modes though
this would've worked if the league community weren't such a bunch of entitled little babies.

This is great, the ranked queues have never been busier. 

Can we have this all year round?
